    • US working age COVID-19 mortality rates - by race, gender and socioeconomic position

      Stark differences in covid related mortality by race, gender and socioeconomic position from

    • Key skills across age groups - the young, and those near to retirement

      OECD barchart of low skills in literacy and numeracy across ages shows - huge difference in age groups in South Korea and worrying similarity across age groups in England.

    • Flu surveillance graph

      Flu surveillance graphs for England have it flatlining in 2021-22 compared to COVID-19 and other scientific papers point to this being true.

    • The web is mobile

      The following pie chart really shows how the smartphone era has changed the web. I have this in my striking graphs category - but it is really only striking to those not born this century (and hence old enough to remember a smartphone era). The figures are browsers more than about 1% share sampled from this caniuse.com page (on 2022-08-29). The percentages on the piechart are the percentages of overall browser useage (which is how Chrome for Android version 104 is only 42.87% when on this piechart it is clearly half the piechart).

      I show how one can quote something true but misleading - then dig into the underlying data to show how to avoid being lead astray.

    • Two world views - facts first or emotion first

      Link to interesting study on estranged parents - which key emotion creates reality or reality creates emotion dividing line - and relate that to a measure of conservatism.

    • The web is mobile

      29 Aug 2022

      The following pie chart really shows how the smartphone era has changed the web. I have this in my striking graphs category - but it is really only striking to those not born this century (and hence old enough to remember a smartphone era). The figures are browsers more than about 1% share sampled from this caniuse.com page (on 2022-08-29). The percentages on the piechart are the percentages of overall browser useage (which is how Chrome for Android version 104 is only 42.87% when on this piechart it is clearly half the piechart).
